thread.title: Beyonce's dad reveals he had no idea singer was pregnant until Instagram announcement
thread.title_full: Beyonce's dad reveals he had no idea singer was pregnant until Instagram announcement

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Beyonce's dad reveals he had no idea singer was pregnant until Instagram announcement
text:
Beyonce's dad reveals he had no idea singer was pregnant until Instagram announcement Mathew Knowles said his daughter's news came as a complete surprise Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Mathew Knowles has this to say on Beyonce's pregnancy Share this video     
Beyoncé didn't tell her dad she was expecting twins. 
The superstar singer revealed on her Instagram account on Wednesday that she and husband Jay Z are expecting twins and the news came as much of a shock to her father Mathew Knowles as it did her fans. 
Mathew, who teaches entertainment industry courses at Texas Southern University, explained on The Insider: "I was shocked. Let me tell you what happened. I got a first text, and I was like, 'Why is this person saying congratulations?' 
"Then I get a second text from one of my students at Texas Southern, and I was like, 'What are you talking about?' He was like, 'Go to the web.' I didn't know myself." 
However, once he heard the news, Mathew - who used to be Beyoncé's manager - quickly called his daughter and they had a "wonderful" chat. Beyonce and Jay Z share throwback pics (Photo: beyonce.com) Beyonce Pregnant Shoot (Photo: Beyonce.com) Beyonce Pregnant Shoot (Photo: Beyonce.com) 
He said: "I was like 'B,' [and] she said, 'Hi, Dad.' I was like, 'You're OK?' Because she sounded a little tired because she's working on the Grammy performance. 
"We just had a wonderful daughter-dad conversation. [But] I'm not gonna tell you all of that... 
"Beyoncé and I had a great conversation. I'm looking forward to seeing her soon and I told her, 'Look, slow down a little bit. You need to slow down a little bit.' " Beyonce Pregnant (Photo: Beyonce.com)
